description:
Integrate Sleekplan with your application to get better insight from your users.

https://sleekplan.com/
name: Sleekplan
plugin_instructions:
Go to your Sleekplan account to find the SSO Key and Widget Script.

To Authenticate a user ;
1. On page load, use the Generate SSO Token action
2. When the token is available, use the Authenticate user
3. Now when a widget open, the user should already be authenticated
